lore: Asurmen’s skill at war is breathtaking, the magnitude of his heroic presence so great that nearby Aspect Warriors are infused with his peerless tactical acumen. In addition to the wrist-mounted shuriken catapults known as the Bloody Twins, he carries the Sword of Asur, whose hilt bears the spirit stone of Asurmen’s brother, Tethesis.

otherAbilities.Hand of Asuryan:: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll .
otherAbilities.Tactical Acumen:: Once per turn, you can target this model’s unit with the Fire Overwatch Stratagem for 0CP, and can do so even if you have already used that Stratagem on a different unit this phase.
